rules: Design: clean visual hierarchy; heading max-width ≤ 12ch; generous white space.
Accessibility: color contrast ≥ 4.5:1; visible focus states; aria-labels where needed; keyboard-only flows.
Performance: no layout shift on load (mobile CLS < 0.1); avoid blocking scripts in <head>.
Content: no lorem ipsum or placeholders; consistent tone and typography scale.
Forms: field validation + clear error copy; aria-live region for errors; success state UX.
Navigation: consistent header/footer; active state; skip-to-content link.
Generated guides: sectioned structure (H1/H2/H3), bullets for steps, top summary box; no orphan lines.
Exported PDFs/docs (if any): page breaks at section boundaries; table of contents if > 4 sections.
Quality: no console errors; no 404 assets; images sized correctly; responsive at 390px/768px/1280px.
